function renderLine(line,pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c=strsub(pattern,i,i) if c=="#" then set_stone("st-brick",i-1,line) elseif c=="." then set_floor("fl-abyss",i-1,line) elseif c=="-" then if not difficult then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=23}) else set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=random(21,22)}) end elseif c=="X" then oxyd(i-1,line) elseif c=="<" then oneway(i-1,line,WEST) elseif c==">" then oneway(i-1,line,EAST) elseif c=="^" then oneway(i-1,line,NORTH) elseif c=="O" then oneway(i-1,line,SOUTH) elseif c=="0" then set_actor("ac-blackball",i-1,line) elseif c=="l" then set_stone("st-laser-e",i-1,line,{name="laser"}) elseif c=="|" then set_stone("st-door-v",i-1,line) elseif c=="S" then set_stone("st-switch",i-1,line,{action="onoff",target="laser"}) elseif c=="x" then set_stone("st-fart",i-1,line) elseif c=="+" then set_stone("st-yinyang1",i-1,line) elseif c=="1" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=1}) elseif c=="2" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=2}) elseif c=="3" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=3}) elseif c=="4" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=4}) elseif c=="5" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=9}) elseif c=="6" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=10}) elseif c=="7" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=11}) elseif c=="8" then set_floor("fl-gradient",i-1,line,{type=12}) elseif c=="o" then set_item("it-vortex-open",i-1,line,{targetx=9.5,targety=10.5}) end end end
